lyrics:
3 contributorsknock knock lyricsverse 1
this time you got it all figured out
think its going to work okay
but ill make sure it wont
cause ill be standing in your way

prechorus 1
so wait a minute if you will
i aint got no time but time to kill
when the ground starts getting hot
it doesnt matter if you run or not

verse 2
this time youve seen it done before
this time youre going to get it right
once more you fail miserably and then
then you do it all over again

prechorus 1
so wait a minute if you will
i aint got no time but time to kill
when the ground starts getting hot
it doesnt matter if you run or not

chorus
once a failure twice a fool
i will knock knock
if you wont knock knock
youre damned knock knock
if you dont knock knock
you did fine knock knock
now youre mine knock knock
you avoided everything except for me
see the hives liveget tickets as low as 66you might also likepostchorus
im busting in
wont pick the lock
im busting in
knock knock

verse 3
ive seen your sort before
you are nothing new
cause my name is failure
and failure is going to come to you

prechorus 2
save me lord and i will
this time i got the time to kill
when the ground starts getting hot
it doesnt matter if you run or not

chorus
once a failure twice a fool
cause i will knock knock
if you wont knock knock
youre damned knock knock
if you dont knock knock
you did fine knock knock
now youre mine knock knock
you avoided everything except for me
postchorus
im busting in
wont pick the lock
im busting in
knock knock

outro
knock knock
im busting in knock knock
knock knock
im busting in knock knockembed
